duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide entry-level desktop support for corporate campus and remote users in support of PC Deployment, Incident Response, and Executive Support, and Hardware Disposal.
Perform deployment of Windows and iOS Laptops from the corporate campus.
Provide technical support to Executive staff members and Administrators.
Support campus A/V equipment in conference rooms and individual workspaces.
Collaborate with onshore and offshore teams in support of deployment operations.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Information Technology or related field (Bachelor's preferred)
